name: Bankless
title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong on why everything will be tokenized! #crypto #tokenization #btc #eth
text:
Synopsis
Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong predicts massive tokenization across projects, companies, and individuals, suggesting crypto is far more than Bitcoin and represents a revolutionary financial technology sector with enormous potential for expansion.

Key Insights
- Armstrong anticipates millions of tokens emerging across various domains, including projects, individuals, and internet memes
- Emerging market tokens like TON and Worldcoin are gaining traction
- DeFi projects such as Uniswap are attracting investor interest
- Layer 2 solutions like Optimism are being developed and integrated
- Companies are expected to issue tokens once regulatory frameworks for securities are clarified
- The crypto ecosystem extends well beyond Bitcoin, representing a comprehensive technological financial revolution
